title: Erik Daniel
text:
Erik Daniel (born 4 February 1992) is a <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> midfielder who plays for <a href="Zag%C5%82%C4%99bie%20Lubin">Zagłębie Lubin</a>, on loan from <a href="%C5%A0K%20Slovan%20Bratislava">Slovan Bratislava</a>.
In February 2020, it was announced that Daniel, as an <a href="Slovaks%20in%20the%20Czech%20Republic">ethnic Slovak</a>, had applied for Slovakian citizenship, which would make him eligible to represent the country on international level.
Spartak Myjava.
In February 2013, he came to <a href="Spartak%20Myjava">Spartak Myjava</a>, on a half-year loan from <a href="FC%20Slovan%20Liberec">Slovan Liberec</a>.
Honours.
Slovan Bratislava
